page.title: 15IFORD HOUSE
page.content:
Iford House Iford House was built in 1795 by Dr William Dale Farr, purchaser of part of the Westover Hundred; the house was then spoken of as Iford Manor and Dr Farr as "the Squire of Iford".He was the freeholder of land reaching from Iford to what is now the position of the Central Station, Bournemouth.
Stourfield House In 1844 Stourfield House was bought by Admiral William Charles Popham in whose family it remained until the estate was broken up in 1893. Stourfield House is now part of the Douglas House Sanatorium in Southboune Road.
Nadine Gerring
